desc:
{c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Up to a {c_number}{SF_0}%{/c} chance to gain {c_number}{SF_1}{/c} Fury when hitting a Crowd Controlled enemy. Double this chance when using two Swords.{if:SF_8}

Killing a Crowd Controlled enemy grants {c_number}[{SF_6} * 100|%+|]{/c} increased Attack Speed for {c_number}{SF_7}{/c} seconds. Double this amount when using two Swords.{/if}
name: One-Handed Sword Expertise
rankup_desc: Chance to activate Lucky Hit increased to {c_number}{SF_2}%{/c}.
simple_desc: {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Up to a {c_number}[{SF_0} * 2|%|]{/c} chance to gain {c_number}{SF_1}{/c} Fury when hitting a Crowd Controlled enemy.
